title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 2 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 2 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Left goes nuts virtue signaling with masks. U.K. data: 92% have been vaccinated or had covid. You can't escape covid, you can only choose how you'll be exposed to it. Fauci: You're encroaching on the rights of the vulnerable if you don't wear a mask. Dr. Megan Ranney on CNN: We are never going back to a pre-pandemic reality. Why not mandate the obese to lose weight or helmets in cars, where does it end? D.C. mayor violates new mask policy by officiating unmasked wedding indoors, WaPo barely covered. Obama throws 500-person birthday party for himself on Martha's Vineyard.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
